mapper.sql: SELECT User.id AS User_id, User.nickname AS User_nickname, User.email AS User_email, User.username AS User_username, User.password AS User_password, User.description AS User_description, User.status AS User_status, User.avatar AS User_avatar, User.sectionId AS User_sectionId, User.createAt AS User_createAt, User.createDate AS User_createDate, User.modifyAt AS User_modifyAt, User.modifyDate AS User_modifyDate, Role.id AS Role_id, Role.code AS Role_code, Role.name AS Role_name, Role.priority AS Role_priority, Role.description AS Role_description, Role.createAt AS Role_createAt, Role.createDate AS Role_createDate, Role.modifyAt AS Role_modifyAt, Role.modifyDate AS Role_modifyDate FROM tb_user AS User LEFT JOIN tb_user_role UserRole ON UserRole.userId = User.id LEFT JOIN tb_role Role ON Role.id = UserRole.roleId
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_user_role UserRole WHERE UserRole.userId = #{userId}
